channel.title: Making Npc's Attackable?
channel.description:
Hey, i've added the kalphite area to my server, and everything seems ok. Except for. The Kalphite Queens ID'd 1158 + 1160 won't take damage when you attack, mage or range them. So i'm using ID 1159 which takes damage from magic, But does not have an "Attack" option.
Does anyone know how to fix/change this?
thanks in advance.
-Anton

item.title: Making Npc's Attackable?
item.dc:creator: @Anton Anton
item.description:
@Anton wrote:

the npc has 500 hp already.

The kalphite area was in one of the tuts from the Old Tutorial list. just download it, right click -> search -> Kalphite

Read full topic

@yonislot wrote:

k 1 thing u dont see the hits.change by npc´s the life 0 to 500 or something.
